mapper.sql: msr.id, msr.fk_id, msr.user_id, msr.remind_time, msr.contents, msr.is_remind
mapper.select:
select msr.id, msr.fk_id, msr.user_id, msr.remind_time, msr.contents, msr.is_remind, tu.open_id as openId, u.wx_user_id as wxUserId, tu.true_name as trueName, tm.titles, tm.end_signup_time as endSignupTime, tu.mobile, tu.com_name as comName, l1.list_value as job, concat(concat(ifnull(sd1.dis_name,''),' '),concat(ifnull(sd2.dis_name,''),' '),concat(ifnull(sd3.dis_name,''),' ')) as region from tjy_meeting_signup_remind msr inner join tjy_user tu on msr.user_id=tu.id inner join tjy_meeting tm on msr.fk_id=tm.id inner join user u on tu.id = u.id left join list_values l1 on l1.id=tu.job left join sy_district sd1 on tu.province=sd1.id left join sy_district sd2 on tu.city=sd2.id left join sy_district sd3 on tu.region=sd3.id where 1=1
AND msr.fk_id=#{fkId}
AND tu.true_name like concat('%',#{trueName},'%')
AND tu.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND tm.titles like concat('%',#{titles},'%')
AND l1.list_value like concat('%',#{job},'%')
AND ( concat( ifnull(sd1.dis_name, ''), ifnull(sd2.dis_name, ''), ifnull(sd3.dis_name, '') ) like concat('%',#{region},'%') )
AND msr.is_remind=#{isRemind}

select msr.id, msr.fk_id, msr.user_id, msr.remind_time, msr.contents, msr.is_remind, tu.open_id as openId, u.wx_user_id as wxUserId, tu.true_name as trueName, tm.titles, tm.end_signup_time endSignupTime, tm.start_signup_time startSignupTime from tjy_meeting_signup_remind msr inner join tjy_user tu on msr.user_id=tu.id inner join tjy_meeting tm on msr.fk_id=tm.id inner join user u on tu.id = u.id WHERE tm.start_signup_time is not null and msr.is_remind=0 and date_format(date_sub(tm.start_signup_time,interval +1 day),'%Y%m%d') = date_format(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')

select msr.id, msr.fk_id, msr.user_id, msr.remind_time, msr.contents, msr.is_remind, tu.open_id as openId, u.wx_user_id as wxUserId, tm.titles from tjy_meeting_signup_remind msr inner join tjy_user tu on msr.user_id=tu.id inner join tjy_meeting tm on msr.fk_id=tm.id inner join user u on tu.id = u.id where msr.user_id = #{userId} and tm.id=#{meetingId} limit 0,1
